title: The Doomed Prince
description: For fantasy romance fans obsessed with Sarah J. Maas, Holly Black, and Raven Kennedy. Youâ€™ll love this snarky, spicy enemies to lovers series.Hate him. Hunt him. But never let him break your heart. Return to Letta and Kier's world of magic, enemies, and intrigue in the second A Feud So Dark and Lovely book.The Doomed Prince is an enemies to lovers fantasy romance with a revenge-sworn heroine and a brooding goblin prince. Expect scorching spice and a dark mystery that lovers of Hades & Persephone and Beauty & The Beast will enjoy.
author: Leigh Kelsey
